  1. STATEMENT: IRFS condemns the conviction of journalist Rauf Mirgadirov

    STATEMENT: IRFS condemns the conviction of journalist Rauf Mirgadirov. Institute for Reporters’ Freedom and Safety (IRFS) resolutely condemns the sentencing of journalist Rauf Mirgadirov to a staggering six years in jail.
